item.title: Eddie's Award Winning Chili
item.description: Indulge in Eddie's Award Winning Chili, a hearty and flavorful dish that combines tender meats, zesty spices, and a touch of heat. Perfect for gatherings or cozy nights in, this chili is sure to impress your family and friends.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 210 minutes

â° Total Time: 240 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 10

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Medium

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 pound ground pork
  • 2 cans kidney beans, drained and rinsed
  • 2 fresh chile peppers, chopped
  • 1 large onion, diced
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cans diced tomatoes
  • 1 cup beer
  • 2 tablespoons chili powder
  • 1 tablespoon cumin
  • 1 tablespoon paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, brown the ground beef and pork over medium heat until fully cooked.
  2. Add the onions and garlic, cooking until softened.
  3. Stir in the chopped chile peppers, diced tomatoes, kidney beans, and beer.
  4. Season with chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper.
  5. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and let simmer for at least 3 hours, stirring occasionally.

item.title: Quick and Flavorful Chicken Dinners for Busy Families
item.description: Enjoy five quick chicken dinners that are ready in just 30 minutes. Perfect for busy weeknights, these flavorful recipes will impress your family and save you time.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 1 cup chicken broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup broccoli florets
  • 1 cup cherry tomatoes

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
  2. Season chicken breasts with garlic powder, paprika, salt, and pepper.
  3. Add chicken to the skillet and cook for 6-7 minutes on each side until golden brown.
  4. Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
  5. In the same skillet, add chicken broth and bring to a simmer.
  6. Stir in heavy cream, broccoli, and cherry tomatoes.
  7. Return chicken to the skillet and cook for an additional 5 minutes until heated through.
  8. Serve warm.

item.title: One-Pan Apple Cider Glazed Chicken for Cozy Dinners
item.description: Enjoy this One-Pan Apple Cider Glazed Chicken, a sweet and tangy dish thatâ€™s perfect for weeknight dinners. Impress your family with its delightful flavors!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 chicken thighs
  • 1 cup apple cider
  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh thyme for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 400Â°F (200Â°C).
  2. In a bowl, mix apple cider, soy sauce, and Dijon mustard.
  3. Heat olive oil in a large oven-safe skillet over medium-high heat.
  4. Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper, then brown them in the skillet for about 5 minutes on each side.
  5. Pour the apple cider mixture over the chicken and bring to a simmer.
  6. Transfer the skillet to the oven and bake for 25 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through.
  7. Garnish with fresh thyme before serving.

item.title: Japanese Strawberry Shortcake - Light and Fluffy Dessert for Family Gatherings
item.description: Experience the joy of Japanese Strawberry Shortcake, a light and fluffy dessert that combines sweet sponge cake with fresh strawberries. Perfect for family gatherings!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 1/2 cups sugar
  • 1/2 cup unsalted butter, softened
  • 1 cup milk
  • 3 large eggs
  • 1 tablespoon baking powder
  • 1 teaspoon vanilla extract
  • 1/4 teaspoon salt
  • 2 cups fresh strawberries, sliced
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 2 tablespoons powdered sugar

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C). Grease and flour two 9-inch round cake pans.
  2. In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
  3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
  4. Stir in the vanilla extract.
  5. In another bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt.
  6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the creamed mixture, alternating with the milk, starting and ending with the flour mixture.
  7. Divide the batter evenly between the prepared pans.
  8. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
  9. Let the cakes cool in the pans for 10 minutes, then turn out onto wire racks to cool completely.
  10. Whip the heavy cream with the powdered sugar until soft peaks form.
  11. Once the cakes are cooled, place one layer on a serving plate and spread a layer of whipped cream over it.
  12. Top with sliced strawberries, then place the second cake layer on top.
  13. Frost the top and sides of the cake with the remaining whipped cream and decorate with additional strawberries.

ğŸ“Œ Save this recipe to Pinterest!

item.title: Nourishing Italian Penicillin Soup for Comfort
item.description: Warm up with this nourishing Italian Penicillin Soup, perfect for comfort during cold days. Easy to make and packed with wholesome ingredients, it's a healing bowl of goodness.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 carrots, diced
  • 2 celery stalks, diced
  • 3 garlic cloves, minced
  • 6 cups chicken broth
  • 1 cup cooked chicken, shredded
  • 1 cup egg noodles
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add onion, carrots, and celery; sautÃ© until softened, about 5 minutes.
  3. Stir in garlic and cook for another minute.
  4. Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil.
  5. Add cooked chicken and egg noodles; simmer until noodles are tender, about 10 minutes.
  6. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
  7. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

item.title: No-Bake Pumpkin Delight for Fall Gatherings
item.description: Indulge in this No-Bake Pumpkin Delight, featuring a ginger snap crust and creamy pumpkin filling. Perfect for fall gatherings, this dessert is easy to make and utterly delicious.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 20 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 0 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • ginger snap cookies
  • cream cheese
  • pumpkin puree
  • whipped cream
  • cinnamon

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Crush ginger snap cookies to form the crust.
  2. Mix cream cheese until smooth.
  3. Add pumpkin puree and blend until combined.
  4. Spread the pumpkin filling over the crust.
  5. Top with whipped cream and sprinkle with cinnamon.

item.title: Creamy Loaded Baked Potato Soup for Family Comfort
item.description: Savor the creamy goodness of Loaded Baked Potato Soup, topped with crispy bacon and melty cheese. Perfect for chilly evenings or as a hearty starter!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 large russet potatoes, peeled and diced
  • 1/2 cup chopped onion
  • 1/2 cup chopped celery
  • 1/2 cup chopped carrots
  • 4 cups chicken broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
  • 1/2 cup cooked bacon, crumbled
  • 1/4 cup chopped green onions
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, combine the diced potatoes, onion, celery, carrots, and chicken broth. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat.
  2. Reduce heat and simmer until the potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.
  3. Using a potato masher, mash the potatoes slightly to thicken the soup.
  4. Stir in the heavy cream, cheddar cheese, and crumbled bacon. Cook until the cheese is melted and the soup is heated through.
  5. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot, garnished with green onions.

item.title: Quick and Hearty Sausage Tortellini Soup for Families
item.description: Enjoy this hearty sausage tortellini soup ready in just 30 minutes! Perfect for busy weeknights, it's packed with flavor and wholesome ingredients your family will love.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 20 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 package of tortellini
  • 1 pound of sausage
  • 4 cups of chicken broth
  • 1 can of diced tomatoes
  • 1 cup of spinach
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 2 cloves of garlic, minced
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, cook the sausage over medium heat until browned.
  2. Add the diced onion and minced garlic, cooking until the onion is translucent.
  3. Pour in the chicken broth and diced tomatoes, bringing the mixture to a boil.
  4. Stir in the tortellini and cook according to package instructions.
  5. Add the spinach and cook until wilted.
  6. Season with salt and pepper to taste before serving.

item.title: Quick and Flavorful Garlic Shrimp for Weeknight Dinners
item.description: This garlic shrimp recipe is quick, easy, and bursting with flavor, perfect for a weeknight dinner or a special occasion. Enjoy gourmet taste with minimal effort.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 10 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 10 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound shrimp, peeled and deveined
  • 4 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 tablespoons olive oil
  • 1 teaspoon paprika
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • 2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped
  • Lemon wedges for serving

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
  2. Add minced garlic and sautÃ© for about 30 seconds until fragrant.
  3. Add shrimp to the skillet and season with paprika, salt, and pepper.
  4. Cook shrimp for 2-3 minutes on each side until they turn pink and opaque.
  5. Remove from heat and stir in chopped parsley.
  6. Serve immediately with lemon wedges.

item.title: Creamy White Chicken Chili for Cozy Nights
item.description: Savor a comforting bowl of creamy white chicken chili, ready in just 30 minutes. Perfect for cozy weeknight dinners or gatherings with friends. Try it tonight!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 cups cooked chicken, shredded
  • 1 can white beans, drained and rinsed
  • 1 cup corn, frozen or canned
  • 1 onion, diced
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 2 cups chicken broth
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 teaspoon cumin
  • 1 teaspoon chili powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh cilantro for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, sautÃ© the onion and garlic until translucent.
  2. Add the shredded chicken, white beans, corn, chicken broth, cumin, chili powder, salt, and pepper.
  3. Bring to a simmer and cook for 15 minutes.
  4. Stir in the heavy cream and heat through.
  5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.

item.title: Effortless Crockpot Marry Me Chicken for Family Dinners
item.description: Discover the creamy and rich flavors of Crockpot Marry Me Chicken, an effortless dish perfect for weeknight dinners. Impress your loved ones with this easy recipe that elevates any occasion.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 240 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 boneless, skinless chicken breasts
  • 1 cup heavy cream
  • 1 cup chicken broth
  • 1 packet ranch seasoning mix
  • 1 cup grated Parmesan cheese
  • 1 teaspoon garlic powder
  • 1 teaspoon onion powder
  • Salt and pepper to taste
  • Fresh parsley for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Place the chicken breasts in the bottom of the crockpot.
  2. In a bowl, mix together the heavy cream, chicken broth, ranch seasoning, Parmesan cheese, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper.
  3. Pour the mixture over the chicken in the crockpot.
  4. Cover and cook on low for 4 hours or until the chicken is cooked through and tender.
  5. Once done, shred the chicken with two forks and stir to combine with the sauce.
  6. Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley.

item.title: Cozy Dump-and-Bake Casseroles for Family
item.description: Indulge in these 10 cozy dump-and-bake casseroles, perfect for chilly nights. Simple yet satisfying, they make weeknight dinners a breeze for the whole family.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 45 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 can diced tomatoes
  • 1 can cream of mushroom soup
  • 2 cups frozen mixed vegetables
  • 2 cups shredded cheese
  • 1 package pasta
  • 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F (190Â°C).
  2. In a large mixing bowl, combine ground beef, diced tomatoes, cream of mushroom soup, mixed vegetables, and Italian seasoning.
  3. Add uncooked pasta and mix until well combined.
  4. Transfer the mixture to a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
  5. Top with shredded cheese.
  6. Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes.
  7. Remove the foil and bake for an additional 15 minutes, or until the cheese is bubbly and golden.

item.title: Heavenly Berry Trifle Cake - Delightful Dessert for Gatherings
item.description: Experience the bliss of layers of fluffy angel food cake, creamy pudding, and fresh berries in this delightful trifle cake. Perfect for gatherings and sure to impress your guests!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 15 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 angel food cake
  • 2 cups vanilla pudding
  • 2 cups fresh mixed berries

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Prepare the angel food cake according to package instructions and let it cool.
  2. In a trifle dish, layer pieces of the angel food cake, followed by a layer of vanilla pudding.
  3. Add a layer of fresh mixed berries on top.
  4. Repeat the layers until all ingredients are used, finishing with a layer of berries on top.
  5. Chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours before serving.

item.title: Quick and Delicious Teriyaki Chicken Wraps for Family
item.description: Savor the vibrant flavors of Teriyaki Chicken Wraps, a quick and delicious meal that the whole family will love. Bring a taste of Japan to your kitchen today!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 10 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 2 chicken breasts, sliced
  • 1/4 cup teriyaki sauce
  • 4 large tortillas
  • 1 cup shredded lettuce
  • 1/2 cup shredded carrots
  • 1/4 cup sliced green onions

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a skillet, cook the sliced chicken breasts over medium heat until no longer pink.
  2. Add the teriyaki sauce and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until heated through.
  3. Warm the tortillas in a separate pan or microwave.
  4. Assemble the wraps by placing the chicken mixture in the center of each tortilla.
  5. Top with shredded lettuce, carrots, and green onions.
  6. Roll up the tortillas tightly and serve immediately.

item.title: Delightful Thai Coconut Curry Dumpling Soup for Cozy Nights
item.description: Warm up with this delightful Thai Coconut Curry Dumpling Soup, a comforting bowl of rich flavors and tender dumplings. Perfect for chilly nights!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 tablespoon vegetable oil
  • 1 onion, chopped
  • 2 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 tablespoon ginger, grated
  • 2 tablespoons red curry paste
  • 4 cups vegetable broth
  • 1 can (14 ounces) coconut milk
  • 1 cup frozen dumplings
  • 2 cups spinach
  • 1 tablespoon soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon lime juice
  • Fresh cilantro for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat.
  2. Add the chopped onion and sautÃ© until translucent, about 5 minutes.
  3. Stir in the minced garlic and grated ginger, cooking for another minute.
  4. Add the red curry paste and cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
  5. Pour in the vegetable broth and coconut milk, bringing the mixture to a simmer.
  6. Add the frozen dumplings and cook for 10 minutes, or until heated through.
  7. Stir in the spinach, soy sauce, and lime juice, cooking until the spinach is wilted.
  8. Serve hot, garnished with fresh cilantro.

item.title: Savory Mongolian Ground Beef Noodles for Quick Meals
item.description: Experience the bold flavors of Mongolian cuisine with this quick and savory ground beef noodle dish. Perfect for busy nights, it's a family favorite packed with rich spices.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 20 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 8 ounces noodles
  • 2 tablespoons soy sauce
  • 1 tablespoon sesame oil
  • 1 tablespoon ginger, minced
  • 3 cloves garlic, minced
  • 1 bell pepper, sliced
  • 1 onion, sliced
  • 2 green onions, chopped
  • Salt and pepper to taste

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Cook the noodles according to package instructions, then drain and set aside.
  2. In a large skillet, heat sesame oil over medium heat.
  3. Add ground beef, ginger, and garlic; cook until the beef is browned.
  4. Stir in bell pepper and onion; cook until vegetables are tender.
  5. Add soy sauce, salt, and pepper; mix well.
  6. Toss in the cooked noodles and green onions; stir until heated through.

item.title: Creamy Ranch Chicken CrockPot - Easy Family Dinner
item.description: This Creamy Ranch Chicken CrockPot recipe is a hassle-free dinner bursting with flavor. With minimal prep, it cooks itself to perfection, making it a family favorite. Try it tonight for a delicious meal!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 240 minutes

â° Total Time: 255 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound chicken breasts
  • 1 packet ranch seasoning
  • 1 cup cream of chicken soup
  • 1/2 cup chicken broth
  • 1/2 cup sour cream

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Place chicken breasts in the CrockPot.
  2. Sprinkle ranch seasoning over the chicken.
  3. In a bowl, mix cream of chicken soup and chicken broth, then pour over the chicken.
  4. Cover and cook on low for 4 hours.
  5. Stir in sour cream before serving.

item.title: Homemade Matzo Ball Soup for Family Gatherings
item.description: Enjoy the comforting flavors of homemade Matzo Ball Soup, featuring fluffy matzo balls in savory chicken broth with fresh vegetables. A perfect dish for family gatherings!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 30 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 6

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 4 large eggs
  • 1 cup matzo meal
  • 1/4 cup vegetable oil
  • 1/4 cup water
  • 1 teaspoon salt
  • 1/4 teaspoon black pepper
  • 8 cups chicken broth
  • 2 carrots, diced
  • 2 celery stalks, diced
  • 1 onion, diced
  • Fresh dill for garnish

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a bowl, beat the eggs and mix in the matzo meal, vegetable oil, water, salt, and pepper. Refrigerate for 30 minutes.
  2. In a large pot, bring the chicken broth to a boil. Add the carrots, celery, and onion.
  3. Wet your hands and form the matzo mixture into balls. Drop them into the boiling broth.
  4. Reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes until the matzo balls are cooked through.
  5. Serve hot, garnished with fresh dill.

item.title: Moist Pumpkin Bread for Cozy Gatherings
item.description: This moist pumpkin bread is infused with cozy spices, making it perfect for gatherings or a comforting treat at home. Experience delightful aromas and flavors that warm the soul.
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 60 minutes

â° Total Time: N/A minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 8

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 3/4 cups all-purpose flour
  • 1 teaspoon baking soda
  • 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 teaspoon ground cinnamon
  • 1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg
  • 1/4 teaspoon ground cloves
  • 1/2 cup vegetable oil
  • 1 cup granulated sugar
  • 1/2 cup brown sugar
  • 2 large eggs
  • 1 cup canned pumpkin puree
  • 1/4 cup water

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. Preheat the oven to 350Â°F (175Â°C). Grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
  2. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves.
  3. In a large bowl, mix the vegetable oil, granulated sugar, and brown sugar until well combined.
  4. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition. Stir in the pumpkin puree and water.
  5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined.
  6. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan and smooth the top.
  7. Bake for 60 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
  8. Allow the bread to cool in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
